entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [tvos][tests] InvalidIVSizes appears to be crashing System.Security.Cryptography.Tests on tvOS arm64 #76728
  • dotnet format command broke when PublishAot is enabled #76727
  • [wasm] Link all the documentation on wasm in the repo, in a single top level document #76722
  • [wasm] Improve experience of debugging library tests #76721
  • Wasm AOT can produce functions with too many parameters #76719
  • EventSourceLogger does not propagate SpanId and TraceId #76718
    8.0.0
  • [mono]build to generate nuget packages with -cmakeargs orrcured error on windows. #76717
  • Access Exception thrown on exit after opening OleDb connection to access database #76712
    Future
  • [wasm] mono_wasm_trace_logger doesn't display message in FireFox console #76710
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe events cannot always be read in realtime. #76704
  • [EnC] FieldInfo.GetValue on a newly-added ValueType field crashes CoreCLR #76702
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Microsoft.DotNet.CoreSetup.Test.HostActivation.StartupHooks.Muxer_activation* tests failed #76681
  • Installer build is too verbose #33218
    Future
  • Test failure: XDocumentTests.Streaming.XStreamingElementAPI.NestedXStreamingElementPlusIEnumerable #76636
    8.0.0
  • Failure in non-context-based hostfxr APIs can leave future calls waiting indefinitely #3571
    Future
  • Single-file: Handle PDB/Map files generated by R2R #3553
    Future
  • System.NullReferenceException when using System.Speech 7.0.0-rc.1.22426.10 from Windows Forms #75667
  • Clear/fix `compMethodReturnsMultiRegRetType` and similar functions. #36868
    Future
  • [System.IO.Hashing] crc32 hash does not match #76720
  • Buffer for enumerator #76675
  • Update .Net source generators to use new SyntaxValueProvider.ForAttributeWithMetadataName api. #70754
    7.0.0
  • Self-contained app crashes when placed in a path with backslashes in Unix #48259
    Future
  • System.AccessViolationException thrown by PrintDocument.Print when platform is X86 #76538
    7.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #75501
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64UInt64ShiftLeftTest #76637
    8.0.0
  • Runtime_34937 and Runtime_33972 JITMinOpts test failures #76344
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\\jit64\\opt\\lur\\lur_02\\lur_02.cmd #76507
    8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] `CompilerServer: fatal error - server reports different hash version than build task` on `linux-musl` when using mono-backed runtime #76543
  • [mono] Incorrect version comparison in the loader #76664
    7.0.0
  • Linq is missing some optimizations for readonly collections #76709
  • [Question] Architecture-independent libraries build #76598
  • Consider clearing JsonSerializerOptions.Caching cache using a timer, not just based on incoming calls #76548
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] [question] JSInterop usage with javascript 'buf' data type #76672
  • WASM CI failure: System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Http.Tests.HttpRequestMessageTest.BlobUri_Marshal_CorrectValues_Browser #76676
  • Support DOTNET_ROOT with dotnet.exe #3394
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make NullabilityInfoContext static #76708
  • Simplify console output when runtime is missing #35697
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run hello world on ARM Linux #33034
    Future
  • SynthesizeRecognizeTests.SpeechSynthesizerToSpeechRecognitionEngine - NullReferenceException #76626
  • Single file bundle extraction misses feedback #3687
    Future
  • Chain.build() fails for custom certs in certain environments #75170
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't check handles in substitution #76730
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove GUID <=> string functions in PAL #76729
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve performance of integer formatting #76726
    area-System.Runtime
  • [test][tvos] Disable InvalidIVSizes overflow case for tvos #76725
    area-System.Security, os-tvos
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use default emscripten cache for AOT tests, on windows #76723
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix JsonDocument thread safety. #76716
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Make sure isRunSmokeTestsOnly is false when manually triggering runtime-extra-platforms #76715
  • Devirtualize EqualityComparer for reference types #76714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Properly handle filesizes larger than 8 Gb #76707
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Add specific formatting string for SSA numbers #76706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove libstdc++ dependency from NativeAOT #76705
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Test Only - Less aggressive instrumentation for Vector256 crash #76701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test Only - Revert SIMD related JIT PRs #76700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix incorrect version comparison in loader #76699
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.11
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Fix incorrect version comparison in loader #76698
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add null check before calling Path.GetFullPath #76696
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: Use the default cache for emcc #76694
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Write out improvements/regressions breakdown details #76711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove unused signature variable #76465
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: disable phi based redundant branch opts #76695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove unused variable from mono_interp_transform_method #76713
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add GenTreeID in allocating registers table #76521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Lower `GetLower` nodes formed from `GetElement(0)` #76492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccExportedRuntimeMethod MSBuild item #76455
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Revert frozen RuntimeType objects and write barriers for frozen objects" #76649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add portable linux source build leg #75546
  • [mono] Fix incorrect version comparison in loader #76665
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: Split some test classes for better helix performance #76697
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Check for non-valid compare chains (#76566) #76662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update docs on libraries cross build #76614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Rewrite the shared JsonSerializerOptions cache implementation. #76607
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Robustify speech recognition test #76652
    area-System.Speech
  • docs: add missing document to microsoft.extensions.options #76121
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Low memory fixes #76674
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Preference locals away from PUTARG_REG killed registers #76671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use CCKeyDerivationPBKDF on iOS #76688
    area-System.Security, os-ios
  • [JIT] Cleanup, share more code between x86 and x64 in `genAllocLclFrame` #76647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Reduce some allocations when emitting CFI code #76562
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for Tizen6.5 and 7.0 #76599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for Tizen 7.0 #76650
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • Add readmes to reflection #76567
    documentation, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Use normal VNs when adding NRE exception sets #76639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce a WASM JIT for interpreter opcodes #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [WIP] Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Failfast on Vector256 test failure #76656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [Release/7.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76691
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE] [Experiment] Try to return MSBuild Server back. #76536
    NO-MERGE
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Abs intrinsics for Amd64 #76668
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Don't cache the Compilation object in steps in the interop source generators #76474
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. #76540
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Ensure we cleanup the marshalling for elements of collections (stateful and stateless) #76693
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Dot intrinsics for Amd64 #76239
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][interp] Optimize out some ldloca uses #76669
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Do not transform SIMD field access into HWIs in minopts, always fold local indirs to `LCL_FLD` #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Disable NativeAOT subset for source-build. #76206
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use AzDO Pipeline Resources to define our build Docker containers #75473
    area-Infrastructure
  • API Dept - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Vector128's Sum and Dot SIMD implementation #76446
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System.Runtime.Intrinsics #76687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.11
  • [wasm] Rewrite interop in debugger tests #74990
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable sourcelink in source-build #76685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
